long_description: The Casio SGW300V-3AV multifunction watch offers the features you need while on the move, whether you're navigating the backcountry or enjoying a languid stroll on a Sunday afternoon. Altimeter tracks elevation gain and loss from -2,300 to 32,800 ft. (-700 to 10,000m) in 20 ft. (5m) increments. Barometer tracks atmospheric pressure changes from 260 to 1,100 hPa (7.68 to 32.49 inHg). Thermometer displays temperatures in increments of 0.2degF (0.1degC) ranging from 14 - 140degF (-10 - 60degC). Digital face displays date, timer and time in 12- or 24-hr. format. World time keeps you on time in 31 time zones (48 major cities); includes city code display and daylight saving on/off. Features 5 daily alarms, stopwatch, hourly chime and auto calendar preprogrammed until the year 2099. 1/1,000-second stopwatch measures elapsed time and split times. LED backlight with afterglow lets you see the display in the dark. The Casio SGW300V-3AV multifunction watch is water resistant to 100m (330 ft.) and operates in temperatures as low as 14degF/-10degC.
short_description: The Casio SGW300V-3AV multifunction watch offers the features you need while on the move, whether you're navigating the backcountry or enjoying a languid stroll on a Sunday afternoon.
